text: Earth to Luna! (Portuguese: O Show da Luna!) is a Brazilian-American flash- animated children's television series. It was directed by Célia Catunda and Kiko Mistrorigo, and produced by TV PinGuim. ==Broadcast and debut== The program premiered on the American channel Sprout, on August 16, 2014.Série nacional de animação estreia na TV dos Estados Unidos . Tela Viva, August 18, 2014 In Latin America, it debuted on October 13, 2014, on Discovery Kids."O Show da Luna!": animação nacional estreia no Discovery Kids . Claro TV, October 13, 2014 The first season had 24 episodes, each 15 minutes long. The target audience is children between the ages of 4 and 9 years old.Animação da TV PinGuim será exibida em canais americanos . ABPITV, March 27, 2014 ==References== Category:2014 television series debuts Category:2010s animated television series Category:2010s children's television series Category:Brazilian animated television series
title: Earth to Luna!
